org.demo.nennig.evernote.core

Class EvernoteAcc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demo.nennig.evernote.core.EvernoteAcc

  • public class EvernoteAcc
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an Evernote account object

    Authenticates the Evernote account one of two ways. Either with OAuth using username and password or with a developer key.

    Currently developer key is the only method supported

    Author:
    Kevin Nennig (knennig213@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getNotestore

        public com.evernote.clients.NoteStoreClient getNotestore()
        This method is used to get the NoteStore from Evernote. This can be used to return notes and other objects from Evernote
        Returns:
        The notestore that holds all Evernote notes and metadata

      • getRequestedNotes

        public com.evernote.edam.notestore.NoteList getRequestedNotes(java.lang.String words)
        Method to return a subset of notes based on a Evernote search. The Evernote grammar can be found from the link below. https://dev.evernote.com/doc/articles/search_grammar.php Example param: updated:day
        Parameters:
        words - - String for Evernote search terms

        Method to get the get the Evernote tags from a note.
        Parameters:
        note - - Evernote note
        Returns:
        - tags form the input note
